originalText.text:
My session with Nyasha was nothing short of amazing!

This was the first time EVER a hair care professional has washed my hair with this level of care and patience..

She is a rare gem and made the entire expreince a calming, therapeutic and nurturing one.

She also did an amazing job restoring my locs after I had been maintaining them myself for about a year.

The result was just stunning.. She brought my locs back to life!

Thank you Nyasha!

originalText.text: NurTured Natural Hair & Loc is an upscale salon featuring stylist with a gentle touch.  From CA to NYC, Nyasha Hair Artistry was recently featured at UCLA Fowler Museum in Los Angeles, CA. "The House Was Too Small" live motion exhibit beautifully illustrated how the powerful designs of braid art magnificently connect all of us!

originalText.text:
Title: Exceptional Lock Re-twist and Styling Experience!

Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ (5 stars)

Review: I recently had the pleasure of getting my lock re-twist and style done at NurTured Hair & Locks, and I must say it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. The level of expertise and care provided by their talented stylists is truly commendable.

The moment I walked in, I was greeted warmly by the friendly staff who made me feel comfortable and valued as a customer. The salon itself had a calming ambiance, creating a soothing atmosphere for the entire visit.

My stylist was not only highly skilled but also incredibly attentive. They took the time to listen to my preferences and understand the look I wanted to achieve. Throughout the entire process, they demonstrated a deep knowledge of locks and provided valuable tips to maintain healthy and beautiful hair.

The re-twist itself was executed with precision and care, resulting in neatly defined and well-maintained locks. The stylist's attention to detail was impeccable, ensuring that each lock was perfectly retwisted, allowing for optimal growth and longevity.

Furthermore, the styling was simply phenomenal! They skillfully brought my vision to life, creating a unique and stylish look that exceeded my expectations. I received numerous compliments on my hair, and it has given me a newfound confidence.

The professionalism exhibited by the entire team at NurTured Hair & Locks was truly exceptional. They truly go above and beyond to provide a personalized experience that caters to individual needs and preferences. The cleanliness of the salon and adherence to high hygiene standards were also very reassuring.

In summary, I wholeheartedly recommend NurTured Hair & Locks for anyone seeking a top-notch lock re-twist and styling service. Their commitment to excellence, along with their friendly and skilled staff, makes them stand out from the rest. I'll definitely be returning for all my future hair care needs.

originalText.text:
I recently got my hair done and I absolutely love the results. Nyasha was very patient with me and took the time to understand exactly what I was looking for. She was very knowledgeable about the process and made sure I understood and was comfortable with the process every step of the way .
10/10 highly recommend! You can tell she absolutely loves what she does and puts a lot of care and effort  into her work.

originalText.text:
Nyasha was amazing !
She is very attentive, patient and she did exactly the same hairstyle as the one I had asked for.

Thanks again for your advice, I'll definitely be back.

I highly recommend her!
